meanings.sent1: The chocolate chips were resmelted for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The metal was resmelted to create a new sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The crayons were resmelted into colorful shapes for fun.
meanings.sent4: The memories resmelted in her mind like wax in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream resmelted quickly under the hot sun.

meanings.sent1: The resmelted metal was poured into molds.
meanings.sent2: The resmelted plastic was used to make new products.
meanings.sent3: The resmelted candle looked like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her resmelted dreams took on new shapes and colors.
meanings.sent5: The resmelted snow sparkled in the sunlight.
